title: Charmed - Book of Shadows - Cover Page - Fancy Font
content:
I'm trying to find out the font used for the B and S on this page.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [001.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/typophile.com/files/001_11.jpg) | 387.11 KB |
author: Randomm

comments.content:
Everything is hand lettered calligraphy.  
To approximate the \_S\_ with a font you could look at those tagged uncial, Lombardic, medieval, illuminated, Irish, medieval, etc.  
Don

A few fonts with simplified versions of the capitals: Initials Gothic C [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/alterlittera/initials-gothic-c/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alterlittera/initials-gothic-c/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/alterlittera/initials-gothic-c/")  
Medieval Caps BA [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bannigan/medieval-caps/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bannigan/medieval-caps/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bannigan/medieval-caps/") Merona [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/merona/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/merona/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/merona/") Gothic Initials Three [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/gothic-initials-three/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/gothic-initials-three/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/gothic-initials-three/")  
Don

More: Hours in the Rain [http://www.dafont.com/hours-in-the-rain.font?fpp=100&text=BS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.dafont.com/hours-in-the-rain.font?fpp=100&text=BS "http://www.dafont.com/hours-in-the-rain.font?fpp=100&text=BS") Queen & Country [http://www.dafont.com/queen-country.font?fpp=100&text=BS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.dafont.com/queen-country.font?fpp=100&text=BS "http://www.dafont.com/queen-country.font?fpp=100&text=BS") Gotische Majuskel [http://www.dafont.com/gotische-majuskel.font?fpp=100&text=BS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.dafont.com/gotische-majuskel.font?fpp=100&text=BS "http://www.dafont.com/gotische-majuskel.font?fpp=100&text=BS")  
Don

Worth browsing: Some initials digitized by Dick Pape [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-72670.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-72670.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-72670.html")  
Don

Camelot Caps by House of Lime [http://www.fontspace.com/house-of-lime/camelotcaps](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.fontspace.com/house-of-lime/camelotcaps "http://www.fontspace.com/house-of-lime/camelotcaps") Used to be available at the House of Lime website. Moved? Gone/  
Don

This could perhaps be the closest I have seen to your \_S\_: Genzsch Initials from House of Lime [http://www.fontspace.com/house-of-lime/genzsch-initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.fontspace.com/house-of-lime/genzsch-initials "http://www.fontspace.com/house-of-lime/genzsch-initials")  
Don

If you want the detail of the fancy initial caps -- too complex for a font -- I recommend a visit to the Aridi website. [http://www.aridi.com/index.php/about-aridi-arts?id=41](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.aridi.com/index.php/about-aridi-arts?id=41 "http://www.aridi.com/index.php/about-aridi-arts?id=41")  
Note that the names are confusing, but the products are excellent.  
Don
Thanks donshottype for going to all the trouble of posting all of those links, I appreciate it!

Less to the point than Don’s detailed list, perhaps here you can find something, not necessarily similar, but in the genre: [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=404&text=BS+bs&af=on](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=404&text=BS+bs&af=on "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=404&text=BS+bs&af=on")

Add to the list: Goudy Text MT Lombardic Capitals [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/goudy-text-mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/goudy-text-mt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/goudy-text-mt/")  
Don
